section.p: The Vital Signs Organizer groups vital signs, which is similar to the Result Organizer, but with further constraints.
An appropriate nullFlavor can be used when a single result observation is contained in the organizer, and organizer/code or organizer/id is unknown.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="CLUSTER" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7279)
The vital signs organizer is a cluster of vital signs observations.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7280)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:7282)
The organizer shall have an <id> element.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="46680005" Vital signs (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:7283)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode/@code="completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:7284)
The observations have all been completed.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:7288)
represents clinically effective time of the measurement, which is most likely when the measurement was performed (e.g., a BP measurement). (CONF:7289).

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] vitalSignObservation (CONF:7285, CONF:7286)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Vital Sign Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.27)
